Hanging Holtens



Exhibit organizers Max Roberts, Stephen Kobourov, and Martin Nöllenburg hang two late-arriving images by Danny Holten while Holten watches
Taken Tuesday, April 09, 2013, 04:20:08AM. Original image size: 3888x2592, 981kb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/25s@ F8, ISO 400, 50mm f/1.4 (80mm equiv)
PS CS5 4800:-10, Exp 0.5 B10, Lens profile
